Generator

The Generator is a tool for creating a concise, formatted post-match thread. This post is not meant for editing and shreds any unnecessary macros in the post.

These are the steps to generate a post-match thread:

  1. Go to a Match Thread post that was created from the rMT tool
  2. Click "edit" or "source" to view the complete text including reddit markup, and copy it to the clipboard
  3. Visit the Generator tab
  4. Paste in the Match Thread into the top textarea, and click Generate
  5. The output in the second textarea is the complete source code for your Post-Match Thread. You can paste it into a new post by clicking Copy to Keyboard
